div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 10:53 am CDT

div.span: Showers, mainly before 1pm. High near 56. Northwest wind 11 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

Showers likely, mainly before midnight. Cloudy during the early evening, then gradual clearing, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 14 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
Sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.
